html:
Sept 27 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *PLC - UPDATE ON PORTFOLIO AND CAPITAL MARKETS SEMINAR *INVESTMENT PORTFOLIOS IN PRIVATE EQUITY AND INFRASTRUCTURE HAVE CONTINUED TO MAKE GOOD PROGRESS IN THIS FINANCIAL YEAR TO DATE *ACTION'S IMPRESSIVE PERFORMANCE HAS CONTINUED WITH SALES, EBITDA AND CASH GENERATION ABOVE BUDGET FOR Q3 TO DATE *ACTION'S YTD SALES AT OVER EUR 4.5 BILLION ARE NOW OVER 20% AHEAD OF LAST YEAR WITH STRONG TRADING CONTINUING ACROSS ALL GEOGRAPHIES *WE EXPECT ACTION'S LTM EBITDA TO END OF P9 TO BE OVER EUR 760 MILLION COMPARED TO EUR 579 MILLION AT SEPTEMBER LAST YEAR AND EUR 506 MILLION AT SEPTEMBER 2019


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-SEP-202105:59:58.957 GMT
